features.description: If the elephant moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. features.name: Illumination

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 â€” 1) slashing damage.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: The frog can breathe air and water

features.name: Standing Leap
features.description: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

features.name: Charge
features.description: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

features.name: Sure-Footed
features.description: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Rampage
features.description: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

features.name: Variant: Hold Breath
features.description: The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

features.name: Variant: Spider Climb
features.description: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

features.name: Hold Breath
features.description: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

features.name: Underwater Camouflage
features.description: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

features.name: Flyby
features.description: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
features.description: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

features.name: Keen Smell
features.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

features.name: Charge
features.description: If the sea horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Blood Frenzy
features.description: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

name: Giant Spider
sense_str: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

features.name: Spider Climb
features.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

features.name: Web Sense
features.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

features.name: Web Walker
features.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: The toad can breathe air and water

features.name: Standing Leap
features.description: The toad's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description:
The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

features.description: If the mammoth moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
features.description: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

features.name: Beast of Burden
features.description: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

features.name: Sure-Footed
features.description: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Hold Breath
features.description: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

features.name: Underwater Camouflage
features.description: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

features.name: Flyby
features.description: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
features.description: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

features.name: Keen Smell
features.description: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

features.name: Pounce
features.description: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

features.name: Hold Breath
features.description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

features.name: Keen Smell
features.description: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

features.description: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

features.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

features.name: Mimicry
features.description: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

features.name: Charge
features.description: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

features.name: Water Breathing
features.description: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

features.name: Spider Climb
features.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

features.name: Web Sense
features.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

features.name: Web Walker
features.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points due to blood loss.
The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.
